batteryDevice.title: Expose SoC as humidity sensor
batteryDevice.description: By default, the SoC (State of Charge / battery level) is exposed as characteristic of the charger device. However, it's possible to configure the SoC to be presented as humidity sensor instead, which allows for incorporating SoC-based automations within the Home app.

chargingPowerDevice.title: Expose Charging Power as sensor
chargingPowerDevice.description: Expose current Charging Power (kw/h) as Ambient Light sensor (Lux). E.g. 0 Lux reflects 0 kw/h and 10,7 Lux reflect 10,7 kw/h

lowBattery.title: Low battery level
lowBattery.description: Which battery level in percentage is considered low
